Description.Text:
Property Location
The May Fair is in the heart of London, walking distance from Berkeley Square and Royal Academy of Arts. This 5-star hotel is close to Buckingham Palace and Trafalgar Square.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 406 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Your pillowtop bed comes with Egyptian cotton sheets. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature designer toiletries and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. Gambling sorts can try their luck at the casino, while others may prefer a health club or a sauna. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and wedding services.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. English breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, limo/town car service, and express check-in. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. English breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and wedding services.

The May Fair is in the heart of London, walking distance from Berkeley Square and Royal Academy of Arts. This 5-star hotel is close to Buckingham Palace and Trafalgar Square.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Berkeley Square - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Royal Academy of Arts - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Spencer House - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
St. James Palace - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Piccadilly Theatre - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Grosvenor Square - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Piccadilly Circus - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Shaftesbury Monument - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
St. James's Square - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Buckingham Palace - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
London Palladium Theatre - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Green Park - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Wellington Arch - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Apsley House - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
The Mall - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 13.4 km / 8.3 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 21.6 km / 13.4 mi

The preferred airport for The May Fair is London (LHR-Heathrow).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
